title: United Technologies Doesn’t Need to Lose Weight

organizations.name: united technologies doesn’t need to lose weight united technologies

text:
United Technologies is weighing a breakup of the company. The question is: Why?
The industrial giant is studying a plan to separate into three units—aerospace, climate controls, and the Otis elevator and escalator unit—by the end of the year. A recent purchase of the stock by activist hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management invites speculation that they will push for a breakup, although the hedge fund has been mum on such plans.
